preference.name: TCAAE121_WDP_DWFX_by_publish_select_mode
preference.preference_description: Configures the content of DWFx format for electrical projects. For each project drawing, it is possible to include the model tab only, the first layout tab only or both the tabs. Possible values: 0 - include the model space only (Default) 1 - include the first layout only 2 - include both the model space and the first layout
